entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers ending this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening then periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022
